comment._content: i really don't think he is, but it looks like he's tattooed on his right arm and left forearm.  just shadows i think.

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: I wonder if this is Reddy Moore, one of the five "fighting Moores of Philadelphia" -- who regularly had matches in New York, Boston and Philadelphia (Active 1906-1917). Here's another photo of him: "Reddy Moore" by Philly Boxing History He was born, August 1, 1889, in Germany, birth name "Augustus Von Franzke". "Reddy Moore was one of five brothers from Philadelphia who were boxers. The others were Pal (the best known of the five), Willie, Frankie, and Al. Their actual family name was Von Franzke." -- Boxrec Boxing Encyclopaedia. His record was 46-9-10 / 19 KO - South Philly - Lightweight. There are numerous news references to him and his matches in the New York Times.

comment.author: 75931446@N00
comment._content: Reddy Moore was my father's uncle-- I'm just curious as to PixelWrangler and Aaron's interest/knowledge of the 'fighting Moores'-- are you guys boxing fans?
